title: The Quiet Sound Of Luluc, Sparked By Punk Rock
teaser: ZoÃ« Randell and Steve Hassett, of the Aussie folk group Luluc, say that punk music inspires the introspective and forlorn melodies on their new album, Passerby. They speak with NPR's Tamara Keith.
